title: Every single thing we know about the new Disney cruise ship
text:
It's a "wish" come true on the high seas.

Interested in Disney? Add Disney as an interest to stay up to date on the latest Disney news, video, and analysis from ABC News. Add Interest

A few more details about the latest ship in the Disney Cruise Line fleet have been released and "Good Morning America" has every single one.

Here's everything we know so far:

1. It's called the Disney Wish.

2. It's the fifth ship in the Disney Cruise Line fleet, joining Fantasy, Wonder, Dream and Magic.

3. It will set sail in January 2022.

4. The atrium features a grand staircase, an oversize chandelier and is inspired by an enchanted fairy tale.

5. The stern features Rapunzel and her sidekick Pascal.

6. It promises to feature more Disney stories and characters than ever before.

7. There are two more ships coming soon after!

The Walt Disney Company is the parent company of ABC News.
description: All the details about the Disney Wish.
